product_name: The North Face Reflective Resolve Rain Jacket - Girls'
long_description: The waterproof and breathable girls' Reflective Resolve Rain Jacket from The North Face is equipped for play in the worst weather. Ripstop nylon shell fabric with HyVent(R) 2-layer laminate is waterproof, breathable, and fully seam-sealed. Mesh-lined body; brushed collar lining; chin guard flap; rip-and-stick stormflap closure. Hood stows in collar. The North Face Reflective Resolve Rain Jacket features zippered hand pockets, elasticized cuffs, ID label and reflective logos.
short_description: The waterproof and breathable girls' Reflective Resolve Rain Jacket from The North Face is equipped for play in the worst weather.
